{{also|Warten}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|wartēn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*wardāną}}. Cognate with {{cog|osx|wardōn}}, {{cog|sv|vårda}}, {{cog|en|ward}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvaʁtən/|[ˈvaʁtən]|[ˈvaʁtn̩]}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈvaːtən/}} {{a|common; especially northern and central Germany}} * {{audio|de|De-warten.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-warten.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{hyphenation|de|war|ten}} * {{homophone|de|waten}} {{qualifier|nonstandard}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|wartet|wartete|gewartet}} # to [[wait]] # to [[maintain]] (e.g. a car) ====Conjugation==== {{rfc|de|imperative is also "wart (du)", cp.
